cards.name: Scapia Credit Card
cards.summary: A zero-forex, UPI-friendly travel card that earns Scapia Coins on every spend and converts them into flight and hotel discounts.
cards.seoDescription: Make travel more rewarding with the Scapia Credit Card by Federal Bank. Earn Scapia Coins on UPI, flights, hotels, and daily spends while enjoying zero-forex markup and milestone vouchers.
keyHighlights: UPI payments via RuPay earn Scapia Coins on everyday spending
Zero foreign exchange markup for international travel
Fast, app-first redemption for flights and hotels

applyNow.label: Apply Now
applyNow.disclaimer: Get 1000 Scapia Coins and 1000 discount on 1st Flight booking on joining by clicking Apply Now.

paragraphs: Scapia keeps things simple with a lifetime-free structure and instant card issuance through the app.

bullets: Get 1000 Scapia Coins on joining through our link.
No rewards on rent, wallet loads, fuel, and other restricted categories.

paragraphs: Scapia Coins can be redeemed directly in the Scapia app for flight and hotel bookings.
Redemptions provide instant discounts rather than transfer partners.

bullets: Redeem Coins for flights across major airlines within the app.
Use Coins for domestic and international hotel stays.

paragraphs: If you spend ₹10,000 in a month you unlock the following benefits for the next month.

bullets: Unlimited lounge access.
100% cashback on shopping/dining at airports up to ₹1,000 per airport visit.
You can also choose to get a spa at the airport.
Please note that you can choose only one of the above-listed benefits per airport departure.

paragraphs: The best strategy is to get lounge access using a different card and use Scapia for shopping.
We feel that Scapia is a no-brainer card since it is lifetime free and provides 0 Forex Markup. Even if you already have a 0 Forex card this can serve as backup.

If you have more than one airport trip coming up in a month then you can extract extraordinary value out of this card. For example, if you have two airport visits coming up in a month then you can get ₹2,000 (16%) back by spending ₹12,000 (₹10,000 for unlocking airport privileges plus ₹1,000 each time at the airport). Similarly, if you have three visits coming up this jumps to ₹3,000 (23%) back for ₹13,000 spend. You get the gist, right?

bullets: Incremental return for frequent flyers.
0 Forex Markup card
You get both UPI and Visa cards
Prices for flights and hotels on Scapia are very competitive

paragraphs: Coming on to spending use cases, we feel that you should not spend heavily on this card. Base reward of 2% is good but not great. Reward on Travel is 4% which we think is very low. Following are some spend use cases which we think can present good opportunities

bullets: If your reward rate for a particular spend on other cards is less than 2% then you can use Scapia.
Use for UPI spends if you don't have a powerful UPI card

paragraphs: You will have to strategize how you use the Scapia card. If you don't have airport visits coming in next month then it does not make sense to spend on Scapia as you can generate higher returns using other cards. But if you do have airport visits coming up next month then it makes sense to spend on Scapia. The more airport visits you have lined up, the better the returns.

bullets: You can make advance tax payments or NPS investments to unlock airport benefits.
Zero forex markup on international transactions.
You get both Visa and RuPay variants of the card.

applyNow.label: Apply Now
applyNow.disclaimer: Get 1000 Scapia Coins and 1000 discount on 1st Flight booking on joining by clicking Apply Now.

cards.name: Axis Bank Atlas Credit Card
cards.summary: Premium EDGE Miles card with tiered rewards, lounge visits, and milestone bonuses tailored for frequent travellers.
cards.seoDescription: Explore the Axis Bank Atlas Credit Card welcome benefits, EDGE Miles earning structure, lounge access, and tier upgrades to plan your travel strategy.
cards.conversion: 1 EDGE Mile = 2 partner miles (2:1 for Marriott Bonvoy)
keyHighlights: 4% value back on everyday spending (≈8% via Accor)
10% value back when booking direct with hotels & airlines or Axis Travel EDGE (≈20% via Accor)
Strong milestone perks for high spenders

bullets: Welcome benefit of 2,500 EDGE Miles when you pay the annual fee and make the first transaction
There is no renewal fee waiver but you get renewal benefits on reaching certain spend thresholds

paragraphs: 2,500 EDGE Miles are valued at a minimum ₹5,000. If transferred to Accor the value jumps to ₹10,000. This more than compensates for the joining fee.

bullets: Annual Income greater than ₹12,00,000

paragraphs: EDGE Miles stack quickest when travel bookings flow through Axis Travel EDGE or direct airline and hotel channels.

rows: Bonus applies up to ₹2,00,000 spend per month, thereafter 2 Miles / ₹100

bullets: Exclusions: gold & jewellery, rent, wallet loads, government payments, insurance, fuel, utilities, telecom.

paragraphs: Redeem EDGE Miles for flights, hotels or experiences, or move them to airline and hotel partners when a sweet spot appears.

bullets: Redeem on Travel Edge portal: 1 Edge Mile = ₹1
Transfer to airline miles at 1 Edge Mile = 2 airline miles
Transfer to hotel points at 1 Edge Mile = 2 hotel points (except Marriott, which is 2:1)

paragraphs: Hit these spends inside your card anniversary year to unlock extra EDGE Miles.

bullets: Tier qualification and milestone tracking follow the card anniversary year.

paragraphs: Atlas tiers unlock higher lounge quotas and milestone earning.

bullets: If you miss the spend target in the next cycle the tier downgrades.
Accor is the sweet spot for redemption with 8% base redemption value.
Exceptional returns when swiping directly at hotels and airlines, both online and offline.
Travel aggregators like MakeMyTrip and Goibibo do not earn accelerated EDGE Miles

paragraphs: This is 1 gem of a card. 4% bases reward rate(~8% accor) is just too good considering it is not a super premium card.
Joining fee of ₹5000 is completly justified and welcome benefits easily compensates for it. Annual Milestone benefits have also been setup very nicely.
Sadly Axis has stopped issuing this card. If you have it keep hold of it.

bullets: Best card for paying directly on hotel and airline websites(offline as well)
Good card for offline spending(do check for exclusions).
EDGE Miles are not encashable.
Tier spend exclusions mirror the earning exclusions.
Track spends on a card-anniversary basis for milestone evaluation.

cards.name: HDFC Bank Regalia Gold Credit Card
cards.summary: Premium lifestyle card bundling Swiggy One, MMT Black Gold, quarterly vouchers, and lounge visits for frequent travellers.
cards.seoDescription: Review the HDFC Bank Regalia Gold Credit Card welcome memberships, 5X partner rewards, milestone flight vouchers, and lounge access before you apply.
cards.conversion: 1 RP = up to 0.5 air mile via airline partners
keyHighlights: Unlock Swiggy One and MMT Black Gold after ₹1 lakh spend in 90 days.
Earn 5X rewards on Myntra, flight bookings, and gift vouchers through SmartBuy.
Earn 10X rewards on PharmEasy, hotel bookings, and IGP through SmartBuy.

cardImage.alt: HDFC Bank Regalia Gold Credit Card

paragraphs: Regalia Gold unlocks lifestyle memberships and a joining voucher when you meet the initial spend requirement.

rows: Swiggy One and MMT Black Gold after ₹1,00,000 spend in 90 days
₹2,500 travel voucher issued after the joining fee posts

bullets: Monthly Income greater than ₹1,50,000

paragraphs: Build a healthy Reward Points balance on every purchase and supercharge partner merchant spends.

bullets: 5X points partner on SmartBuy - Myntra, MakeMyTrip Holiday, Redbus and others
10X points partner on SmartBuy - PharmEasy, Jockey and more
A maximum of 2,000 accelerated RPs can be earned in 1 day
A maximum of 4,000 accelerated RPs can be earned in a calendar month
Exclusions - fuel, wallet, rent and tax payments.

paragraphs: Redeem via HDFC SmartBuy for maximum value or move points to airline partners when conversions align with your itinerary.

bullets: Airline partners convert at up to 1 RP : 0.5 air mile.
You can cover up to 70% of a booking's value with Reward Points.
Accor is the sweet spot as it gives 1 RP = ₹1 value.

paragraphs: Stay on track each quarter and anniversary year to scoop extra travel value.

rows: ₹1,500 voucher from brands like Marriott, Myntra, MMT, Marks & Spencer, Reliance Digital

bullets: Priority Pass visits beyond the quota bill at US$27.
Enjoy Good Food Trail dining offers with flat 10% off at thousands of restaurants via Dineout.

rows: Swipe the card at terminals across India
Usage within India is chargeable, add-on cards need their own Priority Pass

paragraphs: Regalia Gold is a solid offering from HDFC bank. Can work as a voucher card if you plan to redeem on Accor Hotels. Outside Accor Value is good but not great. Thre real bummer is daily cap of 2000 accelerated Reward points and monthly capping of 4000 accelerated Reward points. Those limits get exhausted fast

bullets: Base reward rate is not good enough so use it only through SmartBuy.
Accor gives the best value so you can use this as an Accor co-branded card.
HDFC Salary Account customers can usually get this card as LTF.
Regalia Gold is a no-brainer if you are not eligible for any other premium card
Regalia Gold acts as a stepping stone towards DCB and Infinia

applyNow.disclaimer: Application is handled directly by HDFC Bank.

cards.name: HSBC TravelOne Credit Card
cards.summary: Premium travel card with instant airline transfers, rich lounge access, and milestone bonuses for heavy travellers.
cards.seoDescription: Review the HSBC TravelOne Credit Card welcome bonuses, 1:1 airline and hotel transfers, lounge visits, and milestone rewards before you apply.
cards.conversion: 1 RP = 1 airline mile or hotel point with select partners
keyHighlights: ₹1,000 cashback, ₹3,000 postcard hotel voucher and EazyDiner Prime after ₹10K spend in 30 days.
Earn up to 4 Reward Points per ₹100 on travel and overseas purchases with a 1:1 partner transfer ratio.
Access 6 domestic and 4 international lounges plus golf and lifestyle privileges.

bullets: Welcome bonus of 3,000 Reward Points also triggers on the first ₹1,00,000 spent within 90 days.

rows: ₹1,000 cashback + ₹3,000 Postcard Hotel voucher + 3-month EazyDiner Prime

bullets: Annual Income greater than ₹4,00,000

rows: Accelerated earn up to ₹50,000 equivalent each month
Reward Points accrue at 1 RP per ₹50

bullets: HSBC Market Place has a price guarantee up to ₹1,500 per booking.
15% off up to ₹5,000 on flight bookings via Paytm Flights and ClearTrip
20% off on select duty free stores
Prices on HSBC Marketplace tend to be higher than other OTAs, which dampens the reward rate

paragraphs: Transfer points instantly to airline and hotel partners through the HSBC mobile app for 1:1 conversions on most partners.

bullets: Air India, Air France-KLM Flying Blue, British Airways, Etihad Guest, Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer
Qatar Airways Privilege Club, Qantas, United MileagePlus, Turkish Airlines Miles&Smiles, Japan Airlines, Vietnam Airlines
AirAsia (1:3 conversion ratio)
Marriott Bonvoy, Accor Live Limitless, IHG One Rewards
Wyndham Rewards, Shangri-La Circle (5:1 conversion ratio)
Six domestic and four international lounge visits per year included in the base fee.
Four complimentary golf rounds and twelve lessons annually (one free benefit per month).
Holiday partner offers: 15% off with Yatra, EaseMyTrip, Paytm Travel, Cleartrip, plus 11% off StayVista (max ₹3,000).
Duty-free savings up to 20% at select outlets.

paragraphs: HSBC Travel One has been re-rated since the launch of travel bookings on HSBC Markeetplace. 16% on flight and 24% return on hotels are good propositions.

Prices on HSBC MarketPlace travel website tend to be on a higher side so do your research before booking. What we really do not like about HSBC market place is the room inventory. We have observed that for most hotels and rooms, booking with breakfast option is not available.

bullets: We feel this is one of the best travel cards considering a low entry barrier of a 4 lakh salary requirement.
This card might not suit you if you already hold a super premium card or an Axis Atlas.
High prices on HSBC Marketplace are a bummer.
HSBC has Accor as a transfer partner so it enhances reward value

applyNow.label: Apply via HSBC India
applyNow.disclaimer: Check the HSBC website for the latest eligibility and terms.

cards.name: American Express® Platinum Travel Credit Card
cards.summary: Milestone-driven Membership Rewards card that unlocks Taj travel vouchers, domestic lounge visits, and concierge-backed support for frequent flyers.
cards.seoDescription: Maximize Membership Rewards with the American Express Platinum Travel Credit Card. Learn how milestone bonuses, Taj vouchers, and lounge access combine to elevate your travel strategy.
keyHighlights: ₹10,000 Taj Experiences e-gift card plus 40K MR after ₹4 lakh annual milestone
Membership Rewards never expire while the account remains in good standing

cardImage.alt: American Express Platinum Travel Credit Card

paragraphs: Start your Membership Rewards journey with a sizeable welcome bonus and milestone-driven Taj vouchers each membership year.

bullets: Bonus MR split between automatic posting and a quick call or chat with Amex support.

rows: 25,000 Membership Rewards points + ₹10,000 Taj Experiences e-gift card

bullets: Annual Income greater than ₹6,00,000

paragraphs: Most people treat this as a milestone card to spend ₹4,00,000 in the card anniversary year.

bullets: Exclusions: fuel, insurance, utilities, cash transactions, and in-store EMI conversions.

paragraphs: Marriott is the sweet spot for redemption with a 1:1 conversion ratio.

bullets: Convert MR points to Airline Miles at 2:1 ratio.
Convert MR points to Marriott points at a 1:1 ratio.
Convert MR points to other hotel chain points at a 2:1 ratio.

rows: Capped at 2 visits per quarter for the primary cardmember
Visits for primary cardmember and guests billed at prevailing US$35 rate

paragraphs: A no nonsense card. Rewards on this card are mostly milestone linked and almost everything counts towards Milestone. So you can just swipe it and not worry about exclusions
It would had been great if Amex provided a clear marker for Renewal fee waiver. The power of this card mostly depends on how much money you can extract from marriot points.

bullets: Swipe this card for categories that might be excluded on you other cards.
Marriot is the sweet spot for redemption.
Use Amex multiplier to buy vouchers for accelerated rewards.
When redeeming marriot points try to use 5th Night free offer
Some great use cases for spending on this card are tax payments, NPS or any other goverment payments
Dedicated Platinum Travel assistance with zero lost card liability once reported.
Fuel convenience fee waivers at HPCL locations, plus EMI options on eligible purchases.
Up to 20% dining savings at partner restaurants with American Express offers.

applyNow.label: Apply Now
applyNow.disclaimer: American Express India will provide the full application details.

cards.name: IndusInd Qatar Airways Avios Credit Card
cards.summary: Premium co‑branded travel card that lets cardholders earn Avios with high multipliers on international spends, enjoy milestone bonuses and receive low forex markup along with lounge and meet‑and‑greet privileges.
cards.seoDescription: Review the IndusInd Qatar Airways Avios Credit Card: 20k Avios welcome bonus, up to 6 Avios per ₹200 on select spends, milestone bonuses at ₹8 lakh and ₹16 lakh, low 1.5 % forex markup and complimentary lounge access.
keyHighlights: 20,000 Avios welcome bonus on paying the joining fee.

Earn 6 Avios per ₹200 on point‑of‑sale spends in your selected preferred international destination and 5 Avios per ₹200 on Qatar Airways/British Airways websites, 3 Avios on most other spends and 1 Avios on utilities/government payments.
Milestone bonuses of 18,000 Avios at ₹8 lakh and additional 18,000 Avios at ₹16 lakh annual spend.
Low 1.5 % forex markup at the chosen international destination.

cardImage.alt: IndusInd Qatar Airways Avios Credit Card

paragraphs: A one‑time joining fee of ₹10,000 + taxes (noted by Livemint) earns a welcome bonus of 20,000 Avios.
The annual renewal fee is ₹5,000 + taxes and provides 5,000 Avios as a renewal bonus.

bullets: Select your preferred airline loyalty program (Qatar Airways Privilege Club or British Airways Executive Club) and preferred international destination at the time of application for optimised earning.
Enjoy a 10 % discount on Qatar Airways tickets when you choose Qatar Airways as your preferred airline.
Avios are credited 10 days after statement generation and can be used across Oneworld partner airlines and hotels.
Fuel spends do not earn Avios.
18,000 bonus Avios on spending ₹8 lakh in a year and another 18,000 Avios on the next ₹8 lakh (total 36,000 Avios).
Bonuses credit 10 days after statement generation.
Complimentary lounge access twice per quarter at domestic lounges and twice per quarter at international lounges.
Two complimentary airport meet‑and‑greet services each year for smooth check‑in and security clearance.
Low forex markup of 1.5 % at preferred destination.
Choice of changing preferred destination after each card anniversary.
Avios can be redeemed for flights, upgrades, hotels and experiences across Oneworld partners.

cards.name: ICICI Bank Times Black Credit Card
cards.summary: Super‑premium card with high annual fee that offers generous welcome vouchers, milestone travel packages and unlimited lounge access for frequent travellers.
cards.seoDescription: Discover the ICICI Times Black Credit Card: ₹10,000 luxury stay gift voucher, 2 % to 2.5 % value back, milestone travel experiences, annual fee waiver at ₹25 lakh spend and unlimited lounge access.
keyHighlights: ₹10,000 luxury stay voucher and other welcome privileges including international visa assistance and Zomato Gold membership.
Value back of ~2 % on domestic spends and 2.5 % on international spends with 1 % fuel surcharge waiver.
Milestone benefits worth ₹10,000 each for Klook experiences, airport transfers and Tata CLiQ vouchers, plus a complimentary night at Ayatana Resorts on high spend.
Annual fee waived when you spend ₹25 lakh in a membership year.
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access for primary and add‑on cardholders.

cardImage.alt: ICICI Bank Times Black Credit Card

paragraphs: The card charges a joining and renewal fee of ₹20,000 + GST. Spending ₹25 lakh in the membership year waives the renewal fee.
New cardholders receive a luxury stay gift voucher worth ₹10,000, complimentary visa assistance, airport transfers and access to the Quorum Club.

bullets: Zomato Gold membership is included as a welcome benefit.
CribLife concierge service and travel insurance coverage provide personalised support.
The card offers unlimited complimentary access to domestic and international airport lounges.
1.49 % forex markup on overseas transactions.
₹10,000 worth of Klook experiences and airport shuttle vouchers and a ₹10,000 Tata CLiQ gift card when you reach spend thresholds.
Free one‑night stay at Ayatana Resorts worth ₹20,000 on achieving high spend milestones.
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access for cardholder and companions.
Complimentary travel insurance, concierge support and visa assistance.
Low forex markup of 1.49 % for overseas purchases.
1 % fuel surcharge waiver up to ₹500 per month.

cards.name: ICICI Bank Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card
cards.summary: Invite‑only metal card offering ~3 % value back, Taj Epicure membership, unlimited lounge and golf access plus milestone travel vouchers and insurance protections.
cards.seoDescription: Explore the ICICI Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card: 12,500 point welcome bonus, Taj Epicure membership, 6 RP per ₹200 spend (~3 % return), EaseMyTrip vouchers at ₹4 lakh & ₹8 lakh, unlimited lounge & golf access and fee waiver at ₹10 lakh spend.
keyHighlights: Taj Epicure membership and 12,500 bonus reward points on joining.
Earn 6 reward points per ₹200 on all spends (~3 % value back) with caps on certain categories.
EaseMyTrip vouchers worth ₹3,000 each at ₹4 lakh and ₹8 lakh spends.
Unlimited domestic and international lounge and golf access for primary and add‑on cardholders.
Annual fee reversed on spending ₹10 lakh in a year.

cardImage.alt: ICICI Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card

paragraphs: The invite‑only card charges a joining fee of ₹12,499 + taxes and the same amount annually. Spending ₹10 lakh in a membership year reverses the renewal fee.
On paying joining or renewal fee, cardholders receive 12,500 bonus reward points.

bullets: Reward points worth roughly 3 % can be redeemed for flights, hotels or merchandise.
1000 RP/statement cap applies on reward accumulation for utilities, education and grocery transactions.
5000 RP/statement cap applies on reward accumulation for utilities, education and grocery transactions.
No rewards on Fuel

paragraphs: Redeem via iShop for maximum value.

bullets: Transfer points to Air India Maharaja Cluba att 1 RP : 0.5 air mile ratio.
₹3,000 EaseMyTrip voucher on spending ₹4 lakh and another ₹3,000 voucher on spending ₹8 lakh in a card year.
Annual fee reversal on crossing ₹10 lakh spend in the previous year.
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access via Priority Pass and DreamFolks for primary and add‑on cardholders.
Unlimited golf rounds and lessons across premium courses.
Low 2 % forex markup on international transactions (per official sources).
Complimentary movie tickets and dining privileges through BookMyShow and partner restaurants.

paragraphs: Emerald Private Metal(EPM) is one of the most super premium card that ICICI Bank issues. You would have easily guessed by now that it mostly copies HDFC Infinia. Reward rate of EPM for multiplier category is slightly higher than Infinia with more generous cappings. But we are still waiting for transfer partners to arrive. Nevertheless one should get this card if they are elegible.

bullets: 18% return rate on fligts and voucher through iShop.
36% return rate on fligts and voucher through iShop.
Good Annaual and renewal benefits.
iShop has lower conv. fee on Amazon vouchers compared to what HDFC charges on smartbuy

cards.name: HDFC Bank Diners Club Black Metal Credit Card
cards.summary: Top‑tier Diners Club card offering 5 RP per ₹150 on all spends, 10× points on SmartBuy, complimentary premium memberships, unlimited lounge and golf access and a 2 % forex markup.
cards.seoDescription: Learn about the HDFC Diners Club Black Credit Card: 5 RP per ₹150, 10× SmartBuy rewards, complimentary subscriptions (Club Marriott, Times Prime, Amazon Prime, etc.), monthly vouchers for ₹80k spend, unlimited lounge access and 2 % forex markup.
keyHighlights: 5 reward points per ₹150 on regular spends with up to 10× points on SmartBuy purchases.
Complimentary memberships (Club Marriott, Times Prime, Amazon Prime, MakeMyTrip Black, Swiggy One and Forbes) on spending ₹1.5 lakh within 90 days or upon fee realisation.
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access for primary and add‑on cardholders.
2 % foreign currency markup and six complimentary golf games per quarter.

cardImage.alt: HDFC Diners Club Black Metal Credit Card

paragraphs: Diners Club Black Metal unlocks lifestyle memberships and a joining voucher when you meet the initial spend requirement.

rows: Swiggy One, Amazon Prime and Club Marriot after ₹1,50,000 spend in 90 days of card issuance

bullets: Monthly Income greater than ₹2,50,000

paragraphs: Build a healthy Reward Points balance on every purchase and supercharge partner merchant spends.

bullets: 5X points partner on SmartBuy - Myntra, MakeMyTrip Holiday, Redbus and others
10X points partner on SmartBuy - PharmEasy, Jockey and more
A maximum of 10,000 accelerated RPs can be earned in 1 day or 1 month
Exclusions - fuel, wallet, rent and tax payments.

paragraphs: Redeem via HDFC SmartBuy for maximum value or move points to airline partners when conversions align with your itinerary.

bullets: Airline partners convert at up to 1 RP : 1 air mile.
You can cover up to 70% of a booking's value with Reward Points.

paragraphs: Get 10000 bonus Reward Points on Rs 4 Lakh spend in a calendar quarter.

bullets: Unlimited Domestic and International Lounge Access.

paragraphs: Some consider Diners Club Metal at par with Infinia. Yes Reward rate on voucher is lower but you get 10,000 bonus RPs on spending 4,00,000 a quarter.

bullets: Very good base reward rate of 3.3%.
SmartBuy offers very good return specifically for Flights and Hotels.

cards.name: HDFC Bank Biz Black Credit Card
cards.summary: Premium business card offering 5 RP per ₹150 on select spends, accelerated rewards via SmartBuy, unlimited lounge access, golf benefits and Club Marriott membership with milestone vouchers.
cards.seoDescription: Discover the HDFC Biz Black Credit Card: 5 RP per ₹150, up to 5× points on SmartBuy, Club Marriott membership and Taj stay voucher, flight/Taj voucher at every ₹5 lakh spend, unlimited lounge access and fee waiver at ₹7.5 lakh spend.
keyHighlights: 5 RP per ₹150 on select business spends with up to 5× RP on SmartBuy purchases.
Joining fee waived on spending ₹1.5 lakh within 90 days, renewal fee waived on spending ₹7.5 lakh in the previous year.
Club Marriott membership and Taj stay voucher upon spending ₹1.5 lakh in the first 90 days.
Flight or Taj stay voucher worth ₹5,000 on every ₹5 lakh spend.
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access with six complimentary golf games per quarter.

paragraphs: The card has a joining fee of ₹10,000 + taxes and the same renewal fee annually. Spending ₹1.5 lakh within 90 days waives the joining fee and spending ₹7.5 lakh in the previous year waives the renewal fee.
Upon spending ₹1.5 lakh within 90 days, cardholders receive Club Marriott membership and a complimentary Taj stay voucher.

bullets: Reward points capped at 1.5 lakh points per month.
Points redeem at ₹1 per point for travel bookings via SmartBuy, business catalogue or statement credit.
No reward points on fuel, rent, wallet loads and government payments.
Flight or Taj stay voucher worth ₹5,000 on every ₹5 lakh spend.
Annual fee waiver on spending ₹7.5 lakh in the previous year.
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access for cardholders and employees.
Six complimentary golf games per quarter.
Club Marriott dining, stay and spa discounts up to 20 %.
SmartBuy BizDeals and merchant offers for corporate purchases.
1 % fuel surcharge waiver up to ₹500 per month.
Comprehensive insurance coverage including air accident cover, lost card liability and purchase protection.

cards.name: HDFC Bank Marriott Bonvoy Credit Card
cards.summary: Co‑branded card with Marriott Bonvoy that offers a free night award on first transaction, Silver Elite status, high earning rates at Marriott properties, milestone free nights and travel benefits.
cards.seoDescription: Explore the HDFC Marriott Bonvoy Credit Card: free night on activation, Silver Elite status with 10 elite night credits, 8 points per ₹150 at Marriott hotels, milestone free night awards on ₹6L/₹9L/₹15L spends, lounge & golf benefits and annual fee of ₹3,000.
keyHighlights: Free night award worth up to 15,000 points on first eligible transaction and complimentary Silver Elite status with 10 elite night credits.
Earn 8 Marriott Bonvoy points per ₹150 spent at Marriott hotels, 4 points per ₹150 on travel/dining/entertainment and 2 points per ₹150 on other spends.
Milestone free night awards at ₹6 lakh, ₹9 lakh and ₹15 lakh annual spends.
12 domestic and 12 international lounge visits per year plus two complimentary golf rounds per quarter.
Annual fee of ₹3,000 + taxes.

paragraphs: For a joining fee of ₹3,000 + taxes (same renewal fee), cardholders receive a free night award worth up to 15,000 Marriott Bonvoy points on the first eligible transaction, complimentary Silver Elite status and 10 elite night credits.
No annual fee waiver, renewal benefits mirror the welcome offer in subsequent years.

bullets: Monthly Income greater than ₹1,00,000 for salaried Individual
Income Tax Return (ITR) > ₹15 lakh per annum for Self-employed
Points are redeemable through the Marriott Bonvoy programme for hotel stays, room upgrades and experiences.
Free night award on spending ₹6 lakh, ₹9 lakh and ₹15 lakh in an anniversary year.
Each free night award is capped at properties costing up to 15,000 points per night.
Up to 12 domestic and 12 international lounge visits per year.
Two complimentary golf rounds per quarter.
Complimentary Club Marriott membership offering dining discounts and spa benefits (first year only).
Insurance covers for air accident and medical emergencies.

paragraphs: This is a great card just for getting that 1 free Night stay at Marriot poperties. Also you get good Lounge Access quota. Although do note that if you don't already have core HDFC credit card getting a co-branded card like Marriot Bonvoy card can impact your elegibility to get a core HDFC card like Regalia or Infinia in future.'

bullets: Great for 1 Free night at Marriot Hotels, valued upto 15,000 points.
Good paid lounge access card.

cards.name: HDFC Bank Infinia Metal Credit Card
cards.summary: HDFC’s flagship metal card that offers high reward points on all spending, 10× points on SmartBuy, unlimited lounge and golf access, hotel and dining privileges and an annual fee waiver at ₹10 lakh spend.
cards.seoDescription: Review the HDFC Infinia Metal Credit Card: 12,500 bonus points on joining & renewal, 5 RP per ₹150 with 10× SmartBuy multipliers, unlimited lounge & golf access, hotel & dining benefits via Club Marriott and fee waiver at ₹10 lakh spend.
keyHighlights: 12,500 reward points on paying the joining fee and on renewal.
Earn 5 reward points per ₹150 on all spends and up to 10× points on SmartBuy purchases.
Annual fee waived on spending ₹10 lakh in the previous year.
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access for primary and add‑on cardholders.
Club Marriott membership, premium hotel & dining vouchers and unlimited golf games.

paragraphs: The joining and renewal fee is ₹12,500 + taxes, but spending ₹10 lakh in the previous year waives the renewal fee.
Paying the joining or renewal fee earns 12,500 bonus reward points.

bullets: Reward points can be redeemed at ₹1 per point for flights/hotels on SmartBuy or transferred to airline partners.
No expiry on reward points while the card account remains active.
Unlimited domestic and international airport lounge access via Priority Pass for primary and add‑on cardholders.
Club Marriott membership in the first year providing dining and hotel stay discounts.
Low 2 % forex markup on international transactions.
Unlimited complimentary golf games at select courses.
Concierge services for travel bookings and reservations, and 15 % dining discount via Swiggy Dineout.
Comprehensive insurance coverage including air accident cover and emergency medical assistance.

cards.name: Axis Bank Magnus for Burgundy Credit Card
cards.summary: Exclusive Magnus variant for Axis Burgundy customers offering elevated EDGE Miles, high transfer ratios, unlimited lounge access with guest passes, airport meet‑and‑greet services and dining discounts.
cards.seoDescription: Review the Axis Magnus for Burgundy Credit Card: earn up to 60 EDGE Miles per ₹200, transfer miles at 5:4 ratio, enjoy unlimited lounge access with guest visits, airport meet‑and‑greet, ₹5,000 welcome voucher and fee waiver at ₹30 lakh spend.
keyHighlights: 12 EDGE Miles per ₹200 up to ₹1.5 lakh monthly spend, 35 miles per ₹200 beyond and 60 miles per ₹200 on Travel EDGE portal up to ₹2 lakh monthly.
5:4 transfer ratio to airline and hotel partners with an annual redemption cap of 10 lakh miles (2 lakh on group A partners, 8 lakh on group B).
₹5,000 welcome voucher choice (Luxe gift card/Postcard hotels/Yatra).
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access with four guest visits and four airport meet‑and‑greet services per year.
Annual fee waived on spending ₹30 lakh in the previous year.

cardImage.alt: Axis Magnus for Burgundy Credit Card

paragraphs: A joining and annual fee of ₹30,000 + taxes applies, spending ₹30 lakh in the previous year waives the renewal fee.
Cardholders receive a ₹5,000 welcome voucher choice of Luxe gift card, Postcard hotels voucher or Yatra gift voucher.

rows: Travel EDGE portal spends up to ₹2 L/month

bullets: Miles can be transferred to airline and hotel partners at a 5:4 ratio.
Annual redemption cap of 10 lakh miles: 2 lakh for group A partners and 8 lakh for group B partners.
Unlimited domestic and international airport lounge access with four guest visits per year.
Four airport meet‑and‑greet services annually.
Low 2 % forex markup on international spends.
Dining discounts up to 30 % at partner restaurants and comprehensive travel insurance coverage.
Fuel surcharge waiver and dedicated concierge service.
Access to exclusive Burgundy privileges and lifestyle events.

cards.name: Axis Bank Horizon Credit Card
cards.summary: Airline‑agnostic travel card offering EDGE Miles on travel and everyday spends, 1:1 redemption with more than 15 travel partners and generous lounge access without an annual fee waiver option.
cards.seoDescription: Learn about the Axis Bank Horizon Credit Card: earn 5 EDGE Miles per ₹100 on Travel EDGE bookings and airline spends, 2 miles per ₹100 on other spends, redeem miles 1:1 with 15+ airline and hotel partners, enjoy up to 32 lounge visits per year and pay an annual fee of ₹3,000.
keyHighlights: Earn 5 EDGE Miles per ₹100 on Travel EDGE portal bookings and direct airline purchases and 2 miles per ₹100 on other spends.
Miles redeem at 1:1 ratio with over 15 airline and hotel partners.
Up to 32 airport lounge visits per year across domestic and international lounges.
Annual fee of ₹3,000 with no waiver.
EDGE Miles never expire, providing long‑term flexibility for travel redemptions.

paragraphs: The card has an annual fee of ₹3,000 + taxes with no spend‑based waiver.
There are no specific welcome vouchers, the card focuses on straightforward earn and burn of EDGE Miles.

rows: Travel EDGE portal & direct airline bookings

bullets: Exclusions include fuel, rent, wallet loads and government payments (common Axis exclusions).
Miles are redeemable at 1:1 ratio across more than 15 airline and hotel partners.
Up to 32 lounge visits per year across domestic and international airports.
Access EDGE Miles redemption partners grouped into categories (Group A & Group B) offering a broad choice of airlines and hotels.
No annual fee waiver, cardholders must pay the fee each year.
EDGE Miles never expire, allowing long‑term accumulation and strategic redemptions.
Travel insurance and concierge services for bookings and itinerary planning (per Axis policy).

cards.name: IDFC FIRST Mayura Credit Card
cards.summary: All‑rounder metal card providing tiered reward multipliers, zero forex markup, generous lounge & golf benefits, milestone bonus points and comprehensive travel insurance.
cards.seoDescription: Get to know the IDFC FIRST Mayura Credit Card: up to 10× reward points above ₹20,000 monthly spend, ₹4,000 cashback welcome benefit and 5,000 bonus points, zero forex markup, 16 domestic & 16 international lounge visits, golf rounds and milestone points at ₹8L & ₹15L spends.
keyHighlights: ₹4,000 welcome cashback (₹1,000 each on four transactions of ₹1,000+) and 5,000 bonus points on card issuance.

Tiered rewards: 10× points on monthly spends above ₹20,000 and on birthdays, 5× points on spends below ₹20,000, 3× points on FIRST Digital Card spends (rent, wallet loads, education, government) and 1× point on small & utility spends.
Zero forex markup and up to 16 domestic & 16 international lounge visits plus 16 railway lounge visits annually.
Milestone bonus: 7,500 points on spending ₹8 lakh in a year or 15,000 points on spending ₹15 lakh.
Up to 24 golf rounds/lessons per year, buy‑one‑get‑one movie ticket offer and trip cancellation protection up to ₹50,000.

paragraphs: A joining fee of ₹5,999 + taxes provides a welcome offer of ₹4,000 cashback (₹1,000 on four transactions of ₹1,000 or more within 60 days) and 5,000 bonus reward points on card issuance.
The annual fee of ₹5,999 + taxes has no waiver, instead, cardholders can earn milestone bonus points on high spends.

rows: FIRST Digital Card (rent, wallet load, education, government)

bullets: 1 Reward Point = ₹0.25 when redeemed, points never expire while the card is active.
No reward points on fuel and EMI transactions.
Earn 7,500 reward points worth ₹1,875 on spending ₹8 lakh in a year or 15,000 points worth ₹3,750 on spending ₹15 lakh.
1 % fuel surcharge waiver up to ₹300 per month.
Buy‑one‑get‑one movie ticket offer twice a month on BookMyShow.
Zero forex markup on international transactions.
Up to 16 domestic and 16 international airport lounge visits per year, plus 16 railway lounge visits (max 4 per quarter).
Up to 24 golf rounds or lessons per year (2 per month) on meeting monthly spend thresholds.
Trip cancellation protection up to ₹50,000 and comprehensive insurance covers.
Dining discounts at over 350 partner restaurants via Mastercard Culinary Club.
Roadside assistance worth ₹1,399 and insurance covers including air accident (₹1 crore), personal accident (₹10 lakh) and lost card liability (₹50,000).

cardStrategies.title: Lead with transferable currencies
cardStrategies.description: Choose cards whose rewards move into multiple airline and hotel partners so you can chase the best sweet spots without being locked in.

cardStrategies.title: Balance lounge coverage
cardStrategies.description: Mix domestic and international lounge entitlements across cards to cover the whole family on busy travel days.

favoriteCombos.name: Best Starter Travel Card
favoriteCombos.note: With HSBC Travel One you get handsome returns when making flight and hotel bookings through the HSBC Market Place platform. HSBC has a very extensive list of airline and hotel partners which makes burning easy

favoriteCombos.name: Best All Rounder Travel Card
favoriteCombos.note: With Atlas you get a very good base earning rate of 4% and 10% on travel. This is an all-rounder card and our absolute favorite. Sadly Axis has stopped issuing this card.

favoriteCombos.name: Best Starter Card for non travellers
cards: American Express® Platinum Travel Credit Card
favoriteCombos.note: Amex Platinum Travel gives 40,000 points and a ₹10,000 Taj voucher on spending ₹4,00,000 in a year. If you don't spend on travel too much but still want to earn good points in everyday spending then this is the card for you.
